title: Monster Hunter Rise – v1.1.1 + 10 DLCs + Ryujinx Emu for PC
body:
Monster Hunter Rise – v1.1.1 + 10 DLCs + Ryujinx Emu for PC


Genres/Tags: RPG, Action RPG, Third-person, 3D
Company: Capcom
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 7.5 GB
Repack Size: 5.6 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Switch release with Update v131072 (March 26, 2021) installed over (v1.1.1): 7.2 GB, thanks to Hermietkreeft!
  • 10 DLCs are included and activated
  • Portable and preconfigured Ryujinx Switch emulator v1.0.6806 (Mar 28, 2021) added
  • Switch Firmware v11.0.1 (317 MB) added as a requirement for Ryujinx
  • 100% Lossless, but NOT MD5 Perfect: encryption was removed for better repack size
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 7.5 to 5.6 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-8 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 7.5 GB (~9 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • The first launch time till the main menu is pretty long, be patient – next runs will be much faster; shaders cache is disabled in this build to avoid crashes
  • MHR is one of the most heavy Switch games at this moment, so you need at least 8-threads CPU to run it at playable framerate. 8 GB of free RAM is also recommended
  • Currently the support of AMD GPUs is not very good in Ryujinx, so if you have one – most likely the game won’t work for you

Game Description

Go on a hunt wherever you want, whenever you want in MONSTER HUNTER RISE for Nintendo Switch! Freely explore sweeping landscapes inspired by ancient Japan, slay ferocious wild monsters solo or co-operatively with friends, and forge powerful weapons and armour from your spoils in this sprawling action RPG.

Kamura needs you!
The sighting of a terrifying monster of legend signals the return of a catastrophic event, which threatens to bring chaos to Kamura Village. With the aid of the village elder and the local residents, you must sharpen your hunting skills and save this peaceful settlement from an onslaught of monsters.

New ways to hunt!
From the Wirebug that allow players to zip through the air and wreak havoc by taking control of monsters to the invaluable support offered by new buddies like the Palamutes, MONSTER HUNTER RISE is brimming with new ways to explore and hunt your quarry.

Included DLCs

  • “Kabuki” face paint
  • “Hero” face paint
  • “Spread Wings” face paint
  • “Eye Shadow” makeup
  • “Izuchi Tail” hairstyle
  • “Airy Short Bob” hairstyle
  • “Beachy Waves” hairstyle
  • “Great Baggi Crest” hairstyle
  • Hunter Voice: Master Utsushi
  • Hunter Voice: Hinoa the Quest Maiden
